name: Inner Darkness
description:
Synopsis:

From the creators of The Perfectionist. Embark on a journey as Jake, a young man capable of transforming into a menacing beast by harnessing his inner darkness. He ventures on a quest to discover his roots, save other dimensions from an evil plague and make some unorthodox friends along the way.

Can you control your inner darkness?

Features:

  • quest manager and enemy log
  • choose to be a hero or be dark: each with different quests and endings
  • optional in-game gaming pad
  • 9 playable characters
  • turn based active battle system

Release Date:

June 2019 for Windows and Mac.
